column5: A group of us were planning on doing a little fly-in trip in July, our first.  Unfortunately Manitoba is just a little too pricey for us, so we were looking at a place out of Parry Sound called  "Rainbow Airways".  Does anybody have any experience with this outfitter?  Thanks.
Try Cochrane Air services, the best around!
I don't know anything about this outfitter but I do know, that this area of Parry Sound (Rainbows camps)has some great bass lakes . They are just really hard to get too !! Good Luck
Thanks for the info 4x4, Bass are always fun.
